InstructionData.Title: SDB Furnace Recipe
InstructionData.Author: Saddamo De Beers
InstructionData.Instructions: alias Furnace d0​ alias FurnaceHashDisplay db​ alias ReagentQty d1​ start:​ l r0 Furnace RecipeHash​ s FurnaceHashDisplay Setting r0​ l r1 Furnace Reagents​ s ReagentQty Setting r1​ yield​ j start
